spans.content: Table1 The presented performance attribution methodology is applied to decompose
the PnL of our fund XAIA Credit Debt Capital within the first quarter of
2022,i.e.within the period from 31 December 2021 until 01 Apr 2022. The
presented numbers are basis points relative to the fund net asset value,and
the total fund performance within the considered period was 49 bps.
